text: Péter Kiss (11 June 1959 – 29 July 2014) was a Hungarian Socialist politician. He was one of the candidates to succeed Péter Medgyessy as prime minister in 2004 but lost to Ferenc Gyurcsány. He served as Minister of Social Affairs and Labour of Hungary in June 2006 until June 2007. Kiss died on 29 July 2014 due to prolonged illness. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Socialist politicians
title: Péter Kiss
